Package com.jcabi.dynamo

Interface Credentials

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Credentials.Assumed, Credentials.Direct, Credentials.Simple
    @Immutable
public interface Credentials
    Amazon DynamoDB credentials.

    It is recommended to use Credentials.Simple in most cases.

    Since:
    0.1

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static class  Credentials.Assumed
      Assumed AWS IAM role.
      static class  Credentials.Direct
      With explicitly specified endpoint.
      static class  Credentials.Simple
      Simple implementation.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static Credentials.Simple TEST
      Test credentials, for unit testing mostly.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      com.amazonaws.services.dynamodbv2.AmazonDynamoDB aws()
      Build AWS client.

    • Field Detail

      • TEST

        static final Credentials.Simple TEST
        Test credentials, for unit testing mostly.

    • Method Detail

      • aws

        com.amazonaws.services.dynamodbv2.AmazonDynamoDB aws()
        Build AWS client.

        Don't forget to shut it down after use, using AmazonDynamoDB.shutdown().

        Returns:
        Amazon Dynamo DB client
